documentation.title: Active Directory Automation Agent
documentation.description: Specialized agent for Active Directory tasks including user management, group management, and password resets

usage_examples.title: Reset User Password
usage_examples.description: Resets the password for user jdoe in the company.com domain

usage_examples.title: Create New User
usage_examples.description: Creates a new user account with the specified details

parameters.agent_name: string (required) - Name of the agent to execute
parameters.context: object (optional) - Additional context for the agent

limitations: Rate limited to 60 requests per minute
